comments:
Build 3.3M4

Performing a cleanup action on one file from JDT/Core:
JavadocQualifiedTypeReference.java

using a custom profile:
Eclipse default + qualified this field always + organize import + static field declaring class

I got an error dialog, when previewing the changes, and following dump in the log:
